leshy:IdentityCrisisEvent.NAME: Identity Crisis
DESCRIPTIONS: As you move through ~The~ ~City~ you come across a #pPurple #pMirror. NL You look at it, but you see no reflection.
You see no one but #g~You~ #g~wish~ #g~to~ #g~become~ #g~someone.~
#r@YOU@ #r@EXIST@ #r@AND@ #r@ARE@ #r@VALID!@
#yYou #yare #yat #ypeace #ywith #yyour #ypresence.
You have no hands.
OPTIONS: [TOUCH THE MIRROR] TOUCH TOUCH TO#C# TOUCH TO UCH TOUCH #rTOUCH TOUCH

leshy:MycologistsEvent.NAME: Mycologists
DESCRIPTIONS: You found yourself among a grove of ~thick~ and ~pungent~ mushrooms. NL You squint to see a figure through a ~thick~ cloud of #gspores.

"We are #yThe #yMycologists, yes?" NL ~"Yes."~ NL "A-and we are performing our experiments far from- from-" NL ~"We~ ~are~ ~not~ ~welcome~ ~elsewhere."~ NL "We will experiment on your flock, yes? We- we need #y2 #yof #ythe #ysame creatures?" NL ~"One~ ~for~ ~each~ ~of~ ~us."~
"I- I think this could get #rmessy." NL ~"Look~ ~away."~
"Th- The
.. It is now one? Wh- what have we done?"
"D- Did you bring us... #y2 #yof #ythe #ysame?" NL ~"We~ ~would~ ~like~ ~to~ ~experiment."~ NL "O- Oh dear... Y- You don't." NL ~"You~ ~have~ ~no~ ~duplicate~ ~cards."~
"T- Take one of ours?" NL ~"We~ ~will~ ~use~ ~it~ ~next~ ~time."~
Something went wrong.

leshy:MysteriousStonesEvent.NAME: Mysterious Stones
DESCRIPTIONS: You find a clearing with #r~bloodstained~ stones. NL You believe you can #rsacrifice an #yuntainted creature to give its #ySigils to another #yuntainted creature.
Which creature will inherit its ~power?~
You hope this was worth it.
Something went wrong.
OPTIONS: [Mysterious Stones] You do not have valid creatures.

leshy:BoneAltarEvent.NAME: Bone Altar
DESCRIPTIONS: You find an altar with a ~sinister~ goat skull. NL You feel compelled to make a sacrifice.
The altar seems pleased with your offering.
The altar is ~extremely~ pleased with your offering
Something went wrong.
OPTIONS: [Bone Altar] You do not have any valid creatures, somehow.

leshy:WoodcarverEvent.NAME: Woodcarver
DESCRIPTIONS: You came upon the old #yWoodcarver who fixed her intense gaze upon you. NL After an overlong moment of silence, she moved to offer her carvings.
The grey-haired woman silently collected her carvings and left.

leshy:TrapperEvent.NAME: Trapper
DESCRIPTIONS: You come upon the #yTrapper. He is trying to sell you his pelts. NL "Ye won't find better pelts within a hundred miles!"

leshy:PackEvent.NAME: Pack Rat
DESCRIPTIONS: You come upon the #yPack #yRat. His pack is full to the brim with items.
He sees you are low on supplies and offers you some items from his pack.
He sees you have no room for supplies and decides to accompany you.
Certainly ~nothing~ #rbad will happen to him.

leshy:GoobertEvent.NAME: Goobert
DESCRIPTIONS: #g"I #gwill #g~paint!~ #gJust #glike #gthe #gmaster! NL #gNot #gas #ggood #gas #gthe #gmaster, #gno. NL #gI #gmay #gmake #gsome #g~errors.~ NL #gWhat #gshall #gI #gpaint #gfor #gyou?"
#g"W-What #gdo #gyou #gthink? NL #gWould #gthe #gmaster #gbe #gproud? NL #rPlease #rsay #ryes!"
OPTIONS: [Goobert] You do not have any valid creatures, somehow.

leshy:RecruitmentEvent.NAME: Recruitment
DESCRIPTIONS: Denizens of the forest approach tentatively. NL Only #y1 may grace your paltry deck.
Another creature joins your caravan.

leshy:DredgingRoomEvent.NAME: Dredging Room
DESCRIPTIONS: You find yourself deep within a #yfactory in what appears to be a #ydredging #yroom. A lone robot silently operates a claw machine, pulling scrap from the black water onto a conveyor belt.

You feel the world ~shudder~ as the claw pulls #rsomething from ~01100100~ ~01100101~ ~01100101~ ~01110000~ ~01100010~ ~01100101~ ~01101110~ ~01100101~ ~01100001~ ~01110100~ ~01101000~ NL With this you could #yshape #ythe #yworld, but perhaps some secrets are better left forgotten.
You wonder if you'll be back for more.
